name: Runegraft of Bellows
description: 100% increased Warcry Speed if you have not Warcried Recently
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of Blasphemy
description: 30% chance to Curse non-Cursed Enemies with a random Hex on Hit
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of Gemcraft
description: +1 to Level of all non-Exceptional Support Gems
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of Loyalty
description: 40% chance for Elemental Ailments inflicted on you to be inflicted on a nearby Minion instead
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of Quaffing
description:
Non-instant Mana Recovery from Flasks is also Recovered as Life
25% reduced Mana Recovery from Flasks
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of Refraction
description:
Fire at most 1 Projectile
Projectiles Fork
Skills Chain +1 times
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of Restitching
description: 40% of Damage taken from Critical Strikes Recouped as Life
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of Stability
description: Your Lucky or Unlucky effects are instead Unexciting
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of the Angler
description: All hits are Critical Strikes while holding a Fishing Rod
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of the Bound
description:
20% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Gloves
20% reduced bonuses gained from Equipped Boots
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of the Combatant
description: 50% increased Attack Damage against Enemies with a higher percentage of their Life remaining than you
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of the Fortress
description:
10% reduced Attributes
40% increased Global Defences
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of the Jeweller
description: 10% increased Damage for each unlinked Socket in Equipped Two Handed Weapon
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of the Novamark
description: Nova Spells Cast at a Marked target instead of around you if possible
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of the River
description: 20% chance on reaching Low Life to recover to Full Life
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of the Sinistral
description: 10% more Attack speed with Offhand
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of the Soulwick
description: Gain 1 Vaal Soul per second
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of the Warp
description:
Debuffs on you expire 30% faster
Buffs on you expire 30% slower
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of the Witchmark
description:
Spells Cost +8% of Life
Spells deal added Chaos Damage equal to 2% of your maximum Life
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of Time
description: 20% chance for Skills to not consume a Cooldown on use
dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.

name: Runegraft of Treachery
description:
Auras from your Skills which affect Allies also affect Enemies

dropRequired: Obtained randomly as a reward for shipping resources from Kingsmarch to Riben Fell, Pondium or Kalguur.
